front.title: Leveraging In-network Storage in P2P LiveStreaming

abstract.t: DECADE is an in-network storage infrastructure under discussions and constructions. It can be integrated into Peer-to-Peer (P2P) applications to achieve more efficient content distributions. This document represents a detailed example of integrating DECADE with a dominating P2P application - P2P livestreaming. This document describes a preliminary framework of DECADE client API, P2P live streaming integration, the environment of the test on this integrarion and application performance analysis in the test.
